reference.notes: Original basis sets: Elements References -------- ---------- H : T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 90, 1007 (1989). He : D.E. Woon and T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 100, 2975 (1994). B - Ne: T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 90, 1007 (1989). Al - Ar: D.E. Woon and T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 98, 1358 (1993). Ga - Kr: A.K. Wilson, D.E. Woon, K.A.
